page.title: 18CHILDRENS GAMES cont.
page.content: "only if you are wearing the colour,e.g red"If you are wearing red show the farmer,and walk across but if you are not the farmer chases you across and if he catches you,you are on. {RED ROVER.}Red rover needs a team of boys and a team of girls.set the teams out parallel and then one person from one of the teams .The named person tries to break through the other teams barrier(the barrier was either made by holding hands or either linking arms). This must be done in ten seconds or less. If they did not manage to do this they had to join the other team. The object of the game was for all the people playing to make one big team. However if the person did manage to break through, they went back to the team they were in and the team called a person from the opposite team.
